page.title: 03BATH ABBEY
page.content: The Saxon Abbey in the centre of Bath was built in 781 A.D., but the Abbey seen now was built in 1499 A.D.The Abbey gets 330,000 visitors a year,they come from all over the world _ America, Australia and all over Europe.Bath Abbey has a minimum of 17 services a week.The Abbey employs a small number of people and 1,000 people come to the Abbey on Sundays. The Abbey raises Â£800 every Sunday and Â£80,000 a year in donations.It has 2 choirs, 1 mixed and 1 male. Inside are many beautiful things, such as the stained glass windows,the fan shaped ceiling and tombs of famous people who lived in Bath.It is quite an experience going into this large old building,with so many people and many different languages being spoken there.
